notes.title: Availability of data and materials
notes.p: The datasets generated for this study can be found in the NCBI SRA database under accession numbers SRR11994167- SRR11994181, NBCI BioProject PRJNA638768, [ https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/bioproject/PRJNA638768] and NCBI BioSamples SAMN15207814-SAMN15207828.
